# Dino tractor
This was a fun little side project.
It is a good Idea to save this to your computer for If you ever lose internet :)

![Demo video](/Assets/Demo.gif)

```js
var instance=window.Runner.instance_,now=getTimeStamp()/1e3,lastTime=getTimeStamp()/1e3,deltaTime=0;instance.config.SPEED=.5,instance.config.MAX_SPEED=1.5,instance.currentSpeed=1,instance.gameOver=function(){};var TractorSpriteSheet=document.createElement("img");TractorSpriteSheet.src="data:image/png;base64,";var weelRot=0;function DrawWeel(t,e,a,i,r,s,n){var o=instance.canvasCtx;o.save(),o.translate(t+r/2,e+s/2),o.rotate(n),o.translate(-r/2,-s/2),o.drawImage(TractorSpriteSheet,a,i,r,s,0,0,r,s),o.restore()}instance.tRex.draw=function(t,e){now=getTimeStamp()/1e3,deltaTime=now-lastTime,lastTime=now;var a=instance.canvasCtx;this.canvasCtx.drawImage(TractorSpriteSheet,0,0,61,48,this.xPos,86,61,48),DrawWeel(this.xPos+47,123,61,0,20,19,weelRot),DrawWeel(this.xPos+1,114,61,19,27,27,weelRot),weelRot+=8*deltaTime;var i=instance.horizon.obstacles;for(let t=0;t<i.length;t++){var r=i[t];void 0===r.Bend&&(r.Bend=0,r.draw=function(){var t=instance.canvasCtx;let e=this.typeConfig.width,a=this.typeConfig.height;IS_HIDPI&&(e*=2,a*=2);let i=e*this.size*(.5*(this.size-1))+this.spritePos.x;0<this.currentFrame&&(i+=e*this.currentFrame),t.save(),t.translate(this.xPos,this.yPos+a/2),t.rotate(r.Bend),t.translate(-e/2,-a/2),this.canvasCtx.drawImage(this.imageSprite,i,this.spritePos.y,e*this.size,a,0,0,this.typeConfig.width*this.size,this.typeConfig.height),t.restore()}),r.xPos<instance.tRex.xPos+80&&r.Bend<1.5&&(r.Bend+=4*deltaTime),a.globalAlpha=1}};
```
## Use
1. Turn off your internet or go to chrome://dino.
2. Press ctr+shift+c and click on console.
3. Copy the code above into there and press enter.
